duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with all aspects of technology related to Case Team Support, Office operations, and BCG IT priorities
Provide high-level customer service while supporting case teams and office-based staff
Assist with the management of local technology to increase reliability, security, interoperability, and reduce costs
Support the deployment and management of laptops for staff, including configuration and imaging
Assist with hardware and software asset tracking, inventory management, and office equipment maintenance
Coordinate the repair and maintenance of office printers and computing equipment

Participate in local, regional, and global projects to evaluate existing systems, recommend technology for upgrade and replacement, and evaluate new technologies for potential applicability within BCG
